attributes.action: Dog fouling in my local town.
attributes.additional_details:
There's near enough dogs mess in every street that I live by. 
Not only is it  disgusting and unhygienic. 
I can't understand why nothing is being done about it. 
Iv emailed my local council and written on there Facebook page.
They have said they where going something about but that remains to be seen.
attributes.background: Having to walk on the road with my two children to avoid standing in dogs poo its unacceptable.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Dog fouling in your local area is the responsibility of your council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
